definition: to protect/to defend/to guard against/to prevent
ministry/department/section/part/division/troops/board/classifier for works of literature, films, machines etc

sentences.english: The Russian Defense Ministry dismissed claims of the airport bombing as disinformation .
sentences.chinese: 俄国防部指出关于轰炸机场的消息并不属实。

sentences.english: The project involves extensive cooperation with the Netherlands MoD’s C2 Support Centre.
sentences.chinese: 该计划还包括与荷兰国防部C2支持中心的广泛协作。

sentences.english: Deputy Secretary of Defense Lynn gave a speech on this issue just yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 国防部副部长林恩就在昨天围绕这个问题发表了讲话。

sentences.english: And what's best is for Don Rumsfeld to remain as the Secretary of Defense,"-- Washington, April 18, 2006
sentences.chinese: 现在的‘最好’就是让拉姆斯菲尔德续任国防部长。

sentences.english: Indian Defense Minister Arackaparambil Kurian Antony says that has ramifications on this side of the border.
sentences.chinese: 印度国防部长安东尼说，这些镇压对印度也有影响。

sentences.english: The GAO has more bad news for the Defense Department.
sentences.chinese: 美国审计局给国防部带来了更多的坏消息。

sentences.english: The new Organic Act of eROC Military Law has been approved by eROC Congress.
sentences.chinese: 新国防部暨国军组织法已通过议会表决。

sentences.english: ARPANET started by the US Dept.
sentences.chinese: 美国国防部建立了阿帕网，作研究用。

sentences.english: The advice of the Surgeons General was made available to the Assistant to the Secretary of Defense as necessary.
sentences.chinese: 卫生局长的建议有必要被提供给国防部长助理。

sentences.english: The Defense Message System provides worldwide electronic message service to U. S. DoD users.
sentences.chinese: 该系统为美国国防部用户提供全球电子信息服务。

sentences.english: The Swedish Defense is investing in communications security.
sentences.chinese: 瑞典国防部正在投资研发通信安全技术。

sentences.english: North Korea has test-fired five missiles, South Korea's defence ministry has said.
sentences.chinese: 韩国国防部表示，鲜试验已经发射了五枚燃火式导弹。

sentences.english: At that point, the U.S. objected, because the Dept. of Defense said not to destroy it.
sentences.chinese: 在这点上，美国反对，因为国防部说不能销毁它。

sentences.english: The Defense Administry said the attacks office was destroyed, at least 42 people injured.
sentences.chinese: 国防部长说一个税务所被炸毁，至少42人受伤。

sentences.english: The secretary of defense briefed the president on the enemy's strength.
sentences.chinese: 国防部长向总统简略汇报敌人的兵力。

sentences.english: This will be the last time the U. S. Defense Secretary Gates, who visited Russia.
sentences.chinese: 这将是盖茨最后一次以美国国防部长身份访问俄罗斯。
